name: wp-spin
description: A CLI tool for managing Docker-based WordPress environments
author: Daniel Kapin

scripts.build: npm run clean && npx tsc --build --force && npm run manifest
scripts.prepack: npm run manifest && npm run readme
scripts.test:coverage: npm run build && NODE_OPTIONS="--no-deprecation --no-warnings --require ts-node/register" npx c8 --reporter=html --reporter=text mocha --forbid-only "test/**/*.test.ts"
scripts.test:lint: npm run test && npm run lint
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run lint && echo "✅ All basic tests passed!"
scripts.test:verify: npm run build && npm run test:all && echo "✅ Verification complete!"
scripts.test:ci: npm run build && npm run test && npm run lint
scripts.version: npm run readme && git add README.md
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run manifest && npm run readme && npm install -g .
scripts.prepare:commit: npm run build && npm run test && npm run lint
scripts.test:coverage-c8: npm run build && NODE_OPTIONS="--no-deprecation --no-warnings --require ts-node/register" npx c8 --reporter=html --reporter=text mocha --forbid-only "test/**/*.test.ts"
scripts.test:coverage-c8-init: npm run build && NODE_OPTIONS="--no-deprecation --no-warnings --require ts-node/register" npx c8 --reporter=html --reporter=text mocha --forbid-only "test/commands/init.test.ts"
scripts.test:coverage-integration: npm run build && npx c8 --reporter=html --reporter=text npm run integration-test
scripts.test:combined-coverage: npm run build && npx c8 --reporter=html --reporter=text --reporter=lcov --clean node integration-test.js && echo '\n✅ Coverage report generated. Check the coverage directory.'
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run test:all
